title.rendered: Caledonian AND Altos del Hipódromo II: THE KOGAN UNIVERSE at the heart of Valdemarín

content.rendered: Discover the CALEDONIAN universe and its Altos del Hipódromo II development, an exciting architectural project designed by Marcio Kogan.

excerpt.rendered: Discover the CALEDONIAN universe and its Altos del Hipódromo II development, an exciting architectural project designed by Marcio Kogan.
